org.jooby

Class Body

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.Body

  • public class Body
extends Object
    Utility class for generating HTTP responses from MVC routes (usually). 
     class MyRoute {

   @GET
   @Path("/")
   public Body webMethod() {
     return Body.redirect("/somewhere")
   }
 }
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Body.Formatter 
      static interface  Body.Parser 
      static interface  Body.Reader
      Utility class to properly reading a HTTP request body or parameters.
      static interface  Body.Writer
      Utility class to properly write data into the HTTP response body.
